front.title: YANG Data Models for the Application-Layer Traffic Optimization (ALTO) Protocol

abstract.t: This document defines YANG data models for Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) & Management of Application- Layer Traffic Optimization (ALTO) Protocol. The operator can use these data models to set up an ALTO server, create, update and remove ALTO information resources, manage the access control, configure server discovery, and collect statistical data.
